column17: Traditional and Elegant- Pure Rajasthani Pinkish Red Cotton Saree with Resham work border: This Saree is made of pure cotton Kota Doria fabric in rich pink base. The main attraction of this saree is rich floral golden resham work border. The pallu is adorned with golden zari laces to give it an ethnic effect. The beauty of this saree is checkered design layout which is specialty of Kota Doria. The matching cotton blouse enhances the beauty of the saree. All sarees are ready to wear immediately on receipt with cotton fall stitched and peeco work done all over. The 'Doria' means thread work from cotton yarn in a combination of warp and weft with an exclusive check pattern in the weave itself which is known as 'khat'. The khats are present in the basic fabric itself and are crafted in a very skillful way that the fabric looks transparent. These Sarees are very delicate lightweight and porous.
